title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red Cobb, Lajoie, Speaker, WaJo, Young & Matty
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red Cobb, Lajoie, Speaker, WaJo, Young & Matty
posts.post_content: If you have any of these guys let me know!

T3s are tight! Good luck with your search!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Wow, almost a whole set listed.  Unfortunately, they are in a lot higher grade than the rest of my set so not sure if I will be bidding.

Looks like this is their first auction so hopefully it runs smoothly.
thank you @troutbum97!  Unfortunately, these are too high of a grade for me ... they look mahvelous though!
wow, that Cobb in a 6 is sweet.
